6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Ata' bin Yazid that he heard Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri say:"I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: 'There is no prayer after Fajr until the sun has clearly risen, and no prayer after 'Asr until the sun has fully set

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الصَّلاَةِ بَعْدَ الْعَصْرِ
